alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:21PM EDT until July 13 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHWESTERN JENNINGS COUNTIES... At 220 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Seymour, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hayden, Country Squire Lakes, North Vernon and Vernon. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 49 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
